entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
